nodes.text: The industrial dockyard was a docking facility located in an industrial area of Coronet City, Corellia. The dockyard was located near a decommissioning facility which scrapped Separatist battle droids after the end of the Clone Wars. When the rogue Bad Batch was sent to steal a tactical droid from the facility, they landed their starship, the Havoc Marauder, at the industrial dockyard before proceeding to the scrapping facility on foot.
